Tri-Life Leadership Program

Tri-Life Leadership Program

This leadership workshop needs a new website that inspires trust and provides important information to help users decide whether or not to attend. Because the program emphasizes balance and harmony in life, I’m using the golden ratio to construct a balanced layout for the website.
